author: Isaac Scher
title: US Surgeon General warns Americans to follow the coronavirus guidelines to stay home: 'This week, it's going to get bad'
description: US Surgeon General Jerome Adams issued a stern warning about the coronavirus pandemic on Monday: "This week, it's going to get bad." Speaking on the "Today" show, Adams warned that Americans must stay home, lest they contribute to the spread of COVID-19, the …
content:
A week ago, the United States had 4,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus. By Monday morning, more than 39,000 people are sick in the US, and at least 477 people have died.
As states brace for triage and clamp down on non… [+1556 chars]
